content: I’m noticing more and more that there are rarely any discussions in groups. It’s mostly people sharing a blog post. What frustrates me is they don’t share why they are sharing the blog post. When I share something, I ask a question such as, “What tools do you use…I disagree with this part of the article and here’s why…”, etc. Trying to get a discussion going is like pulling teeth. Anyone else? I’d love to hear your suggestions on what works for you.
